item.description:
Happy January Cocktailers!!! 2010 is fitting to be YOUR year! I can JUST feel it!!!

Ok, so I hope you can make this gathering, we have another amazing guest speaker lined up!!

Monique Morimoto Flaherty, MS, CPCC is a fellow coach and she will be speaking a bit about "Letting go the need to be perfect!" We shall have Monique speak for about 15 minutes or so, then we'll do our normal breakout commentary..then come back to group.

For me...this concept has proven to be monumental in my personal/professional growth. Growing up I always participated in the things I knew I was good at b/c I was afraid to look bad or to be a detriment to any team. But what I didn't realize is, by focusing on the things I was only good at, limited my living and trying new things.
So last year, was the first year I began to practice this aspect of life by creating an affirmation that abolished this way of thinking and it has truly opened some incredible doors for me.

For those of you on this wonderful personal growth journey who haven't really explored this..I strongly encourage you to come!!!

Please bring: an open mind...your favorite notebook, cash for bar, food and the $5 group fee.

More INFO on Monique...
www.soulworkscoaching.com
~~Voted one of the Top Ten Executive Coaches by the readers of Women's Business Boston, July 2008
~Recipient of the 2007 International Coaching Award for Community Involvement and Development
~Contributing Author in The Professional Woman Network
http://www.youtube.co...
http://twitter.com/mo...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where Cocktails & Conversations
item.name: Jan C&C-- "Letting Go of the Need to be Perfect"-Guest Speaker Monique Flaherty
